<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Timely Tutor](/Spells.aspx?ID=1020)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 137 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** your  eidolon  or  familiar 
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You serve as an astral connection between your eidolon or familiar and the Akashic Record—a demiplane consisting of a comprehensive psychic library—then turn to the creature for advice. If you cast this spell on your familiar, your familiar adds your spellcasting ability modifier on checks to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) with the [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) skill of your choice, much like it does for [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) and [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15). Your familiar must have the [speech](/Familiars.aspx?ID=12) familiar ability in order to share any information it learns with you. If you cast this spell on your eidolon, it instead becomes trained in the Lore skill.

 If you lose physical contact with the target, its connection to the Akashic Record is severed and _timely tutor_ immediately ends.
name: Timely Tutor
